notes.essay-notes:
SAMPLE ESSAY NOTES
TOPIC: how organized you are
very organized at work:
can always find important information
example of finding work for important contract
not very organized at home:
cannot find bills
cannot find passport
cannot find keys

check-list.item-text: I used careful planning to outline my response.
I included the topic and the organization in the introduction.
I used transitions to connect the supporting paragraphs.
I summarized the main points in the conclusion.
I checked the sentence structure in my response.
I checked the grammar in my response.
